column8: This is the recent Malaysia opinion polls before the General Election from Invoke Malaysia:Example of Exit Polls:EqGUQJqcTFADo you think that Malaysia should implement the Exit Polls right after the General Election or nation-wide independent opinion polls like in UK? What you all think?
huh. when they did the poll?
If GS and PH combined.... they might win the GE. But then Hadi and his goons pop up.....

Something that you need to see too:In 13th General Election:Popular votes BN: 47.38Popular votes PR: 50.87Seats BN: 133 (59.91)Seats PR: 89 (40.09)Can see? First past the post cannot be trusted anymore.
Only the real election matter.See the US election and poll vs the real results. Wrong like shit. Totally useless.    All this exit poll just another ways of making money.
